data.content:
Neeko (Prestige Star Guardian Neeko)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points | Release Date: September 26, 2019

Neeko, the curious chameleon, has joined the prestigious ranks of the Star Guardians with her dazzling new skin, Prestige Star Guardian Neeko. This highly sought-after skin was released on September 26, 2019, and can be obtained by spending 100 Prestige Points. With its unique design and stunning visual effects, this skin truly embodies the essence of the Star Guardian theme.

Prestige Star Guardian Neeko features a vibrant color palette, combining shades of pink, purple, and gold to create a visually striking appearance. Neeko's usual green skin is replaced with a soft pink hue, giving her a more ethereal and otherworldly look. Her hair is styled in long, flowing locks with golden accents, adding to her celestial charm.

One of the most notable aspects of this skin is the intricate design of Neeko's outfit. She wears a form-fitting bodysuit adorned with star-shaped patterns and delicate gold trimmings. The bodysuit is primarily purple, with pink accents and golden details that shimmer as she moves. Completing her ensemble are knee-high boots with golden heels and matching gloves that enhance her magical abilities.

As a Star Guardian, Neeko wields a staff that is as enchanting as she is. The staff is adorned with a large, glowing pink crystal at the top, emitting a radiant light that symbolizes her connection to the stars. When Neeko casts her abilities, the staff emits dazzling particles and trails of stardust, adding a touch of celestial magic to her every move.

In addition to the visual enhancements, Prestige Star Guardian Neeko also features unique sound effects. Her abilities are accompanied by ethereal chimes and twinkling sounds, further immersing players in the enchanting world of the Star Guardians. The attention to detail in this skin truly sets it apart, making it a must-have for Neeko enthusiasts and collectors alike.

Now, let's delve into the story of Neeko and her place in the League of Legends universe. Neeko is a Vastayan from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal. With her ability to shapeshift, she can take on the appearance of anyone she pleases, making her a master of deception. However, Neeko's true nature is one of curiosity and innocence, as she explores the world outside her secluded tribe.

In the game, Neeko is classified as a mage and excels at dealing burst damage and crowd control. Her abilities revolve around deception and trickery, allowing her to confuse and outmaneuver her opponents. Neeko's passive ability,

allows her to temporarily take on the appearance of an allied champion, making her a formidable trickster on the battlefield.

Neeko's strengths lie in her ability to surprise and confuse her enemies. With her shapeshifting capabilities, she can easily deceive opponents and catch them off guard. Her ultimate ability,

is a powerful crowd control ability that can turn the tide of team fights. By channeling her energy, Neeko leaps into the air and slams down, stunning nearby enemies and dealing massive damage.

However, Neeko also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other mages. Her abilities have long cooldowns, making her vulnerable during the downtime. Additionally, Neeko's shapeshifting ability can be countered by champions with strong area-of-effect abilities or those who can quickly burst her down before she has a chance to react.

Despite her weaknesses, Neeko has found her place in the League of Legends as a versatile mage who excels at surprising her opponents. Her unique playstyle and deceptive abilities make her a favorite among players who enjoy outsmarting their enemies. With the release of Prestige Star Guardian Neeko, fans of the champion can now showcase their love for her in style.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Neeko's various appearances, including her base skin and other available skins. Whether you're a fan of her mischievous nature or simply appreciate her magical abilities, Neeko is a champion that continues to captivate players with her unique playstyle and charming personality.

Neeko (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Neeko, the Curious Chameleon, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game, League of Legends. As a versatile mage, Neeko has the ability to shapeshift and deceive her enemies, making her a formidable opponent on the battlefield. Her default skin represents her true form, showcasing her vibrant and colorful appearance.

Neeko's default skin captures her essence as a chameleon, with her body covered in vibrant green scales. Her large, expressive eyes are a striking yellow, and her long, slender tail adds to her reptilian charm. Neeko's hair is a vibrant shade of pink, flowing down her back in loose waves. She wears a leafy headdress, adorned with flowers and feathers, which adds to her mystical and nature-inspired aesthetic.

The intricate details of Neeko's default skin are truly captivating. From the delicate patterns on her scales to the intricate design of her headdress, every aspect of her appearance has been carefully crafted. The attention to detail is evident in the way her tail sways as she moves and the way her eyes sparkle with mischief.

Neeko's default skin perfectly embodies her playful and mischievous personality. As a champion who excels at deception, her vibrant and colorful appearance serves as a disguise, allowing her to blend seamlessly into her surroundings. Whether she's hiding in the jungle or engaging in combat, Neeko's default skin helps her remain undetected until it's too late for her enemies.

In terms of gameplay, Neeko is a versatile mage who can adapt to various roles. Her abilities revolve around deception and trickery, making her a master of mind games. Neeko's passive ability,
allows her to temporarily take on the appearance of an allied champion, confusing her enemies and potentially turning the tide of battle. Her other abilities, such as
and

provide crowd control and burst damage, making her a formidable opponent in team fights.

However, Neeko does have her weaknesses. Her abilities are heavily reliant on landing skill shots, which can be challenging for less experienced players. Additionally, her shapeshifting ability requires careful timing and decision-making to maximize its effectiveness. Neeko's squishy nature also makes her vulnerable to burst damage, so positioning and map awareness are crucial for her survival.

In the lore of League of Legends, Neeko hails from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal. As a curious and adventurous chameleon, she ventured out into the world to satisfy her insatiable thirst for knowledge. Along her journey, she discovered the city of Piltover and the technological wonders it held. Fascinated by the people and their inventions, Neeko decided to stay and learn more about their ways.

Neeko's story intertwines with other champions in the game, such as Ezreal and Caitlyn, as she becomes entangled in their adventures. Her playful and mischievous nature often leads her into unexpected situations, but her ability to shapeshift allows her to adapt and overcome challenges.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Neeko, including her default skin. Whether you're interested in learning more about her abilities, exploring her lore, or simply admiring her vibrant appearance, this page is your go-to resource for all things Neeko.

Neeko: The Curious Chameleon

Release Date: November 21, 2018

Neeko, the Curious Chameleon, is a mischievous and playful champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her ability to shapeshift and deceive her enemies, Neeko brings a unique and unpredictable playstyle to the game. In this article, we will delve into Neeko's story, her strengths and weaknesses, her background in the game, and her place in the League of Legends universe.

Story and Background

Neeko hails from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal, a mystical land known for its connection to nature and magic. Born with the ability to change her appearance at will, Neeko quickly became fascinated with the world beyond her tribe's borders. She ventured out into the world, driven by her insatiable curiosity and desire to learn about other cultures.

As she explored the world, Neeko discovered that her shapeshifting abilities were not only useful for blending in but also for tricking her enemies. She realized that her powers could be used to protect her tribe and bring harmony to the world. With this newfound purpose, Neeko joined the League of Legends, a renowned arena where champions from all corners of the world compete in epic battles.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Neeko's unique ability to shapeshift allows her to confuse and deceive her enemies, making her a formidable opponent. Her passive ability,

allows her to temporarily take on the appearance of an allied champion, making it difficult for enemies to distinguish her from her teammates. This can be used to set up surprise attacks or to escape dangerous situations.

Neeko's Q ability,
sends out a seed that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing damage to all nearby enemies. This ability is great for wave clear and poke damage, making Neeko a strong laner. Her W ability,

allows her to temporarily turn invisible and gain movement speed, making it easier for her to engage or disengage from fights.

One of Neeko's most powerful abilities is her E ability,

Neeko throws a magical spiral that damages and roots the first enemy hit. This ability can be devastating in team fights, as it can immobilize multiple enemies, allowing Neeko and her team to follow up with additional damage.

However, Neeko does have her weaknesses. Her shapeshifting abilities are most effective when used to deceive enemies, but experienced players can quickly identify her true form through careful observation. Additionally, Neeko relies heavily on landing her skillshots to maximize her damage output. Missing her abilities can significantly reduce her effectiveness in fights.

Neeko in the Game

Neeko is primarily played as a mid-lane mage or a support champion. Her ability to deceive enemies and set up plays makes her a valuable asset in team compositions that rely on surprise engages or pick-offs. Her wave clear and poke damage also make her a strong laner, allowing her to control the lane and pressure her opponents.

Neeko's ultimate ability,

is a game-changer. She leaps into the air and slams down, dealing damage and stunning all nearby enemies. This ability can turn the tide of team fights and is especially devastating when combined with her other crowd control abilities.

Neeko's versatility and unpredictability make her a fun and exciting champion to play. Whether you enjoy outsmarting your opponents with clever shapeshifting or setting up big plays with her crowd control abilities, Neeko offers a unique and enjoyable gameplay experience.

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Neeko's skins. From the adorable
to the fierce

each skin brings a fresh and visually stunning look to the champion. Explore the different skins and find the one that best suits your style!

So, if you're looking for a champion that can deceive, surprise, and bring a touch of whimsy to your gameplay, Neeko is the perfect choice. Embrace your inner chameleon and join Neeko on her quest for knowledge and harmony in the League of Legends!

Neeko (Street Demons Neeko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 19, 2020

Neeko, the curious chameleon, has always been known for her ability to blend in and deceive her enemies. With her latest skin,

she takes on a whole new persona, embracing the urban underworld with style and flair. This skin transforms Neeko into a mischievous street artist, ready to unleash her artistic talents and trickery on the unsuspecting denizens of Summoner's Rift.

Street Demons Neeko is a 1350 RP skin that was released on November 19, 2020. It offers a fresh and unique take on Neeko's character, giving players the opportunity to experience her in a completely different light. This skin is part of the Street Demons skin line, which features other champions like Akali, Evelynn, and Kai'Sa.

Neeko's Street Demons skin is a visual feast for the eyes. Her base model is transformed into a vibrant and colorful street artist, complete with graffiti-inspired body paint and a stylish urban outfit. Her chameleon abilities are showcased through her ability animations, where she seamlessly blends into the environment, camouflaging herself as various street art elements.

One of the standout features of Street Demons Neeko is her ability effects. Her abilities are reimagined to fit the theme of a street artist, with paint splatters and graffiti motifs. Her Q ability, Blooming Burst, sends out a burst of colorful paint, while her W ability, Shapesplitter, transforms her into a spray can, allowing her to dash away in a cloud of paint. Her E ability, Tangle-Barbs, creates a web of paint that ensnares her enemies, and her ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, creates a stunning explosion of paint and color.

Not only does Street Demons Neeko offer a visually stunning experience, but it also adds a layer of depth to Neeko's character. The skin's splash art showcases Neeko in the midst of creating a masterpiece on a crumbling wall, surrounded by her fellow street artists. It captures the essence of the urban underworld, where creativity and rebellion collide.

Now, let's delve into the story of Neeko and her place in the League of Legends universe. Neeko is a Vastayan from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal. She possesses the unique ability to shapeshift, allowing her to take on the appearance of anyone she desires. Neeko's tribe, the Oovi-Kat, has always valued harmony and balance with nature, but Neeko's insatiable curiosity led her to venture beyond the safety of her tribe.

Neeko's journey brought her to the bustling city of Piltover, where she encountered the wonders of human civilization. Fascinated by the diversity and complexity of the world outside her tribe, Neeko decided to explore further. She made her way to the Institute of War, where she discovered the existence of the League of Legends. Intrigued by the concept of champions battling for a greater cause, Neeko joined the League, eager to learn and protect the harmony she cherished.

In the game, Neeko is a versatile mage who excels at deceiving her enemies and turning the tide of battle. Her passive ability, Inherent Glamour, allows her to temporarily take on the appearance of an allied champion, confusing her opponents and granting her bonus movement speed. Her Q ability, Blooming Burst, sends out a projectile that damages and marks enemies, allowing Neeko to detonate the mark for additional damage. Her W ability, Shapesplitter, allows her to transform into an allied champion, gaining their basic abilities and a burst of movement speed. Her E ability, Tangle-Barbs, sends out a skillshot that damages and roots enemies, while her ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, causes Neeko to leap into the air and stun nearby enemies upon landing.

Neeko's strengths lie in her ability to deceive and surprise her enemies. Her shapeshifting abilities make her a formidable opponent, as she can easily confuse her enemies and catch them off guard. Her burst damage potential is also significant, especially when she can land her Q ability and detonate the mark with her passive. Neeko's ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, is a game-changer in team fights, as it can stun multiple enemies and turn the tide of battle in her team's favor.

However, Neeko also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other mages. Her abilities have relatively high cooldowns, making her vulnerable during the downtime. Neeko's shapeshifting abilities also require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, as mistimed transformations can leave her exposed and vulnerable.

Overall, Neeko is a unique and versatile champion in the League of Legends roster. Her ability to deceive and surprise her enemies, combined with her burst damage potential, makes her a force to be reckoned with. Whether you choose to play her as a mid-lane mage or a sneaky support, Neeko's Street Demons skin adds a touch of urban flair to her already captivating character.

For more information about Neeko and her various appearances, including the Street Demons Neeko skin, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website and watch the champion spotlight videos. Embrace the urban underworld with Neeko's Street Demons skin and let your artistic talents shine on the Rift!

Neeko (Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: January 8, 2021

Neeko, the curious chameleon, has taken on a mesmerizing new form with her Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko skin. This skin, released on January 8, 2021, is a part of the Shan Hai Scrolls skin line, which draws inspiration from Chinese mythology and folklore. With its vibrant colors and intricate design, Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko is a visually stunning addition to Neeko's repertoire.

The Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko skin transforms Neeko into a mystical creature from the depths of the sea. Her appearance is reminiscent of a beautiful mermaid, with flowing blue and purple hair, shimmering scales, and elegant fins. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, as every aspect of Neeko's appearance has been carefully crafted to reflect the theme of the Shan Hai Scrolls.

Neeko's abilities also receive a thematic makeover with the Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko skin. Her Q ability, Blooming Burst, now features swirling water and aquatic plants, while her W ability, Shapesplitter, showcases a stunning transformation into a sea creature. Her E ability, Tangle-Barbs, becomes a wave of water that ensnares her enemies, and her ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, creates a mesmerizing explosion of water and sea creatures.

Aside from the visual changes, the Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko skin also includes new sound effects and voice lines. Neeko's voice takes on a more ethereal and enchanting tone, further enhancing the mystical atmosphere of the skin. The sound effects for her abilities have been modified to match the aquatic theme, immersing players in the world of the Shan Hai Scrolls.

Now, let's delve into the story of Neeko and her place in the League of Legends universe. Neeko is a Vastaya, a magical creature with the ability to shape-shift. She hails from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal, where she lived a peaceful and harmonious life. However, when she discovered the existence of the outside world, her curiosity got the better of her, and she ventured out to explore.

Neeko's journey led her to the Institute of War, where she encountered champions from all corners of Runeterra. Fascinated by their diverse forms and abilities, Neeko decided to join the League of Legends to learn more about the world and its inhabitants. Her playful and mischievous nature quickly made her a beloved champion among the summoners and fans of the game.

In terms of gameplay, Neeko is a versatile mage who excels at deceiving her enemies with her shape-shifting abilities. Her passive ability, Inherent Glamour, allows her to take on the appearance of an allied champion, confusing her opponents and setting up surprise attacks. Her Q ability, Blooming Burst, deals damage in an area and marks enemies, while her W ability, Shapesplitter, allows her to transform into an allied champion, gaining their basic abilities and a temporary burst of movement speed.

Neeko's E ability, Tangle-Barbs, sends out a magical projectile that damages and roots the first enemy hit. Her ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, is a powerful AoE stun that deals damage and knocks up enemies caught in its radius. With her versatile kit and deceptive playstyle, Neeko can be a formidable force in the hands of a skilled player.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Neeko's appearances, including the Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko skin. Whether you're a fan of Neeko or simply appreciate the stunning visuals of the Shan Hai Scrolls skin line, this page is a treasure trove of information for all League of Legends enthusiasts.

Neeko (Winter Wonder Neeko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: December 12, 2019

Winter Wonder Neeko is a delightful skin that brings a touch of frosty magic to the mischievous chameleon champion, Neeko. Released on December 12, 2019, this skin is part of the Winter Wonder skin line, which features champions dressed in enchanting winter-themed outfits. With its unique design and charming animations, Winter Wonder Neeko is a must-have for any Neeko enthusiast.

Winter Wonder Neeko: A Frosty Transformation

Winter Wonder Neeko transforms the playful and vibrant Neeko into a winter sprite, complete with a cozy outfit and icy abilities. Her base model is adorned with a fluffy winter hat, a warm scarf, and snowflake patterns on her clothing. Her vibrant green hair is now a frosty blue, adding to the wintery aesthetic. Neeko's abilities also receive a magical makeover, with snowflakes and ice crystals replacing her usual effects.

Her passive ability, Inherent Glamour, allows her to take on the appearance of an allied champion, confusing enemies and creating opportunities for strategic plays. With Winter Wonder Neeko, this ability is enhanced with a frosty shimmer, making her transformations even more enchanting.

Neeko's Q ability, Blooming Burst, is transformed into Snowball Strike. Instead of throwing seeds, Neeko hurls snowballs at her enemies, leaving behind a trail of frosty particles. Her W ability, Shapesplitter, allows her to transform into an allied champion, granting her movement speed and a temporary shield. Winter Wonder Neeko's W showcases a flurry of snowflakes as she takes on the appearance of her chosen ally.

Her E ability, Tangle-Barbs, becomes Winter's Wrath. Neeko summons a line of icy thorns that root enemies in place, encasing them in frost. The visual effects of this ability perfectly capture the essence of winter, with shimmering ice and snowflakes surrounding the trapped enemies.

Finally, Neeko's ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, becomes Snow Blossom. Instead of a vibrant explosion of flowers, Winter Wonder Neeko creates a stunning burst of snowflakes and ice crystals, freezing enemies in their tracks. The visual spectacle of this ability is truly breathtaking, adding an extra layer of magic to Neeko's already impressive arsenal.

Neeko: The Curious Chameleon

Neeko is a unique champion in the League of Legends universe, known for her shapeshifting abilities and mischievous nature. Hailing from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal, Neeko possesses the power to take on the appearance of others, blending seamlessly into any environment. Her playful personality and curiosity often lead her on exciting adventures, as she explores the world beyond her tribe.

In the game, Neeko is classified as a mage and excels at dealing burst damage and crowd control. Her ability to transform into an allied champion allows her to confuse enemies and set up unexpected plays. Neeko's strengths lie in her ability to surprise opponents with her deceptive tactics, catching them off guard and turning the tide of battle in her team's favor.

However, Neeko also has her weaknesses. She relies heavily on her abilities to deal damage, making her vulnerable when her abilities are on cooldown. Additionally, her shapeshifting ability requires careful positioning and timing to be effective, as enemies can easily see through her disguise if they pay close attention.

Neeko's past in the game has seen her rise in popularity among players due to her unique playstyle and charming personality. Her ability to deceive enemies and create chaos on the battlefield has made her a favorite pick for those who enjoy unpredictable and strategic gameplay. With the release of Winter Wonder Neeko, players now have the opportunity to experience Neeko's mischievous nature in a frosty new way.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Neeko's appearances, including the Winter Wonder Neeko skin. Whether you're a fan of Neeko's base design or eager to explore her various skins, this page is your go-to resource for all things Neeko.

Neeko (Bewitching Neeko)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: October 29, 2020

Neeko, the curious chameleon, has always been a fan-favorite champion in League of Legends. With her ability to shapeshift and deceive her enemies, she brings a unique playstyle to the game. And now, with the release of the

skin, players can experience a whole new level of magical charm.

The

skin is a bewitching twist on Neeko's original appearance. With its vibrant colors and enchanting details, this skin truly captures the essence of Halloween. Neeko herself is transformed into a mischievous witch, complete with a pointy hat, flowing robes, and a broomstick. Her abilities also receive a magical makeover, with sparkling effects and spooky animations that add an extra layer of charm to her gameplay.

One of the standout features of the

skin is the attention to detail. From the intricate patterns on her robes to the glowing orbs floating around her, every aspect of this skin has been carefully crafted to create a visually stunning experience. The vibrant purple and orange color scheme perfectly captures the spirit of Halloween, making Neeko a standout champion on the battlefield.

But the

skin is not just about looks. It also brings a new level of immersion to the game. With its unique animations and sound effects, this skin truly brings Neeko's magical abilities to life. Whether she's casting spells or transforming into her enemies, every action feels more impactful and satisfying with this skin equipped.

Now, let's take a step back and delve into the story of Neeko, the curious chameleon. Neeko hails from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal. As a Vastaya, she possesses the ability to shapeshift, allowing her to take on the appearance of anyone she desires. This power, combined with her natural curiosity, led her on a journey to explore the outside world.

Neeko's journey eventually brought her to the world of Runeterra, where she encountered the champions of League of Legends. Intrigued by their unique abilities and personalities, Neeko decided to join the League and use her shapeshifting powers to learn more about the world and its inhabitants.

In the game, Neeko is known for her versatility and deceptive playstyle. Her ability to shapeshift not only allows her to confuse and deceive her enemies but also gives her access to a wide range of abilities. She can transform into her allies to provide support, or she can take on the appearance of her enemies to sow chaos on the battlefield.

Neeko's strengths lie in her ability to surprise her opponents. With her shapeshifting powers, she can easily catch her enemies off guard and turn the tide of battle in her favor. Her crowd control abilities, such as her root and stun, make her a formidable opponent in team fights, while her high burst damage allows her to quickly eliminate squishy targets.

However, Neeko also has her weaknesses. She relies heavily on her abilities to deal damage, which means that if her abilities are on cooldown, she becomes vulnerable. Additionally, her shapeshifting can be easily countered by champions with true sight or abilities that reveal her true form. Players must be mindful of these weaknesses and play strategically to maximize Neeko's potential.

Overall, Neeko is a unique and versatile champion in League of Legends. Her shapeshifting abilities and deceptive playstyle make her a favorite among players who enjoy outsmarting their opponents. And with the

skin, players can now experience Neeko's magical charm in a whole new way.

For more information about Neeko and her various appearances, including the
skin, be sure to check out the League of Legends website. There, you'll find detailed champion profiles, gameplay videos, and more. So, embrace the magic and unleash your inner witch with Neeko's
skin!

Neeko (Prestige Star Guardian Neeko 2022)

RP Cost: TBA | Release Date: TBA

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Neeko, a mischievous chameleon who can shapeshift into anyone she pleases. Neeko has captured the hearts of players with her playful personality and versatile playstyle. And now, she is set to receive a stunning new skin - Prestige Star Guardian Neeko (2022).

The Prestige Star Guardian Neeko skin is a highly anticipated addition to the League of Legends universe. As a part of the prestigious Star Guardian skin line, this skin offers a fresh and glamorous take on Neeko's character. With its release date and RP cost yet to be announced, players are eagerly awaiting the opportunity to add this skin to their collection.

Let's delve into the details of this enchanting skin. Prestige Star Guardian Neeko features a vibrant color palette, with shades of pink, purple, and gold dominating her appearance. Her outfit is adorned with intricate star patterns, giving her a celestial aura. Neeko's hair is styled in long, flowing locks, and she wears a majestic crown that adds to her regal presence. The skin also includes unique visual effects, such as sparkling stardust trails and dazzling spell animations, which further enhance the magical theme of the Star Guardian line.

But the beauty of this skin goes beyond its visual appeal. Prestige Star Guardian Neeko also comes with new voice lines, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in Neeko's world. Her voice is filled with wonder and excitement, perfectly capturing her playful nature. The skin also features a new recall animation, where Neeko transforms into a shooting star and gracefully descends back to the battlefield. These small details add depth and personality to the skin, making it a must-have for Neeko enthusiasts.

Now, let's take a step back and explore the story of Neeko, the champion behind the Prestige Star Guardian Neeko skin. Neeko hails from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal. As a Vastaya, she possesses the ability to shapeshift, allowing her to blend seamlessly with her surroundings. Neeko's playful and curious nature often leads her to venture beyond her tribe's borders, where she encounters the wonders and dangers of the outside world.

In the game, Neeko is classified as a mage and excels at deceiving her enemies with her shapeshifting abilities. Her passive ability, Inherent Glamour, allows her to take on the appearance of an allied champion, confusing opponents and creating opportunities for strategic plays. Neeko's Q ability, Blooming Burst, sends out a magical projectile that damages and marks enemies, while her W ability, Shapesplitter, allows her to transform into an allied champion, gaining their basic abilities and temporarily increasing her movement speed.

Neeko's E ability, Tangle-Barbs, sends out a root that damages and immobilizes enemies, setting them up for devastating combos. Finally, her ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, causes Neeko to leap into the air and then slam down, dealing damage and stunning enemies in the area. With her versatile kit, Neeko can adapt to various situations and deceive her opponents with ease.

Neeko's story and abilities make her a beloved champion in the League of Legends community. Her playful personality and unique playstyle have captured the hearts of players around the world. Whether you're a fan of her mischievous nature or her versatile gameplay, Neeko is a champion that offers endless possibilities.

If you're interested in learning more about Neeko and her various appearances, you can find information and videos on the official League of Legends website. From her base skin to the upcoming Prestige Star Guardian Neeko (2022), there's a world of enchantment waiting to be explored.

Neeko (Star Guardian Neeko)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 12, 2019

Neeko, the curious chameleon, has joined the ranks of the Star Guardians with her dazzling new skin, Star Guardian Neeko. This enchanting skin transforms Neeko into a celestial being, adorned with vibrant colors and cosmic energy. Let's delve into the story behind this captivating costume and explore all the intricate details that make Star Guardian Neeko a must-have for any League of Legends player.

Star Guardian Neeko is a 1350 RP skin that was released on September 12, 2019. It is part of the Star Guardian skin line, which features a group of champions who have been chosen to protect the universe from evil forces. Neeko's transformation into a Star Guardian showcases her innate ability to blend in and adapt, as she takes on the appearance of a radiant celestial being.

The Star Guardian Neeko skin features a stunning visual overhaul, with vibrant colors and cosmic effects that bring her to life. Her base model is adorned with a celestial robe, complete with flowing sleeves and a starry pattern. Her chameleon-like abilities are showcased through her color-changing hair, which shifts between shades of blue, purple, and pink. Neeko's staff is transformed into a magical wand, topped with a glowing star that emits a soft, ethereal light.

One of the most striking aspects of Star Guardian Neeko is her ability animations. Her Q ability, Blooming Burst, summons a burst of starry energy that explodes upon impact. Her W ability, Shapesplitter, allows her to transform into an ally champion, and this transformation is accompanied by a dazzling display of cosmic particles. Neeko's E ability, Tangle-Barbs, ensnares enemies with glowing vines, while her ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, creates a stunning explosion of stardust that damages and stuns enemies caught in its radius.

Star Guardian Neeko also comes with unique recall animation, where she creates a portal of swirling stardust and steps through it, disappearing momentarily before reappearing in a burst of cosmic energy. This recall animation perfectly captures the otherworldly essence of the Star Guardian theme.

Now that we've explored the captivating details of Star Guardian Neeko, let's take a moment to delve into Neeko's story and her place in the League of Legends universe.

Neeko is a Vastayan chameleon who hails from a hidden tribe deep within the jungles of Ixtal. She possesses the unique ability to shapeshift, allowing her to take on the appearance of anyone she pleases. Neeko's playful and curious nature led her to venture beyond her tribe's borders, where she encountered the world of humans and the chaos of the League of Legends.

In the game, Neeko is a versatile mage who excels at deceiving her enemies and turning the tide of battle. Her passive ability, Inherent Glamour, allows her to temporarily take on the appearance of an allied champion, confusing her enemies and granting her bonus movement speed. Neeko's Q ability, Blooming Burst, deals damage to enemies in a target area and marks them, allowing her to deal additional damage with her empowered auto-attacks. Her W ability, Shapesplitter, allows her to transform into an allied champion, gaining their basic abilities and a temporary burst of movement speed. Neeko's E ability, Tangle-Barbs, sends out a magical projectile that damages and roots the first enemy hit. Finally, her ultimate ability, Pop Blossom, causes Neeko to leap into the air and then slam into the ground, dealing damage and stunning enemies in a large area.

Neeko's strengths lie in her ability to deceive and confuse her enemies. Her shapeshifting capabilities make her a formidable opponent, as she can easily trick her enemies into targeting the wrong champion. Her burst damage potential and crowd control abilities also make her a valuable asset in team fights, where she can disrupt the enemy team and turn the tide of battle in her team's favor.

However, Neeko does have her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making her vulnerable to champions who can quickly burst her down. Additionally, her shapeshifting abilities require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, and a skilled opponent can easily see through her illusions and predict her movements.

Overall, Neeko is a unique and versatile champion who brings a touch of whimsy and deception to the League of Legends universe. With her Star Guardian Neeko skin, she takes on a celestial form that is as enchanting as it is powerful. Whether you're a fan of Neeko's playful nature or simply appreciate the beauty of the Star Guardian theme, Star Guardian Neeko is a skin that is sure to captivate players of all backgrounds.
